lessons.japanese: 君は趣味にそんな大金を費やすべきではなかったのに。
lessons.english: You ought not to have spent so much money on your hobby.

lessons.japanese: 学生は多くの時間を勉学に費やす。
lessons.english: A student spends a lot of time studying.

lessons.japanese: 出来る限りの時間は読書に費やす。
lessons.english: I spend what time I can spare reading.

lessons.japanese: つまらないことに時間を費やすな。
lessons.english: Don't waste your time on trifles.

lessons.japanese: 彼女は本に収入の大部分を費やす。
lessons.english: She spends most of her income on books.

lessons.japanese: 上級管理職は部下の教育に多くの時間を費やす。
lessons.english: Senior executives spend a lot of time training their subordinates.
